bill.title: Medical Marijuana; Registration; Requirements
bill.description: Makes clarifying housekeeping amendments to the registration requirements regarding the medical use of marijuana. Adds certifying physician requirements for written certification of medical marijuana use. (SB2574 HD2)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to HTH/CPN.
The committee(s) on HTH/CPN has scheduled a public hearing on 02-10-14 2:00PM in conference room 229.
The committee(s) on HTH/CPN deferred the measure until 02-12-14 1:30PM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPN were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Nishihara, Wakai, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Taniguchi.

The committee(s) on HTH recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in HTH were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Green, Baker, Chun Oakland, Nishihara, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from HTH/CPN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2485) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-04-14.
Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 2 (Hee, Shimabukuro). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 233) in amended form (SD 1).
Pass First Reading
Referred to HLT, JUD/CPC, referral sheet 28
Bill scheduled to be heard by HLT on Wednesday, 03-19-14 8:30AM in House conference room 329.

The committees on HLT recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Morikawa, Creagan, Jordan, Kobayashi, Oshiro, Woodson, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Carroll, Hashem.
Reported from HLT (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1167-14) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD/CPC.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD/CPC with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Tokioka, Ward, Yamane excused (3).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD/CPC on Friday, 03-28-14 2:00PM in House conference room 325.
Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Rhoads, Brower, Creagan, Kawakami, C. Lee, Nakashima, Tsuji, Wooley, McDermott, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Har, Belatti, Ito.

The committees on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Representative(s) McKelvey, Kawakami, Brower, Cachola, Creagan, Evans, C. Lee, Nakashima, Tsuji, McDermott, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 5 Excused: Representative(s) Belatti, Har, Ito, Oshiro, Yamane.
Reported from JUD/CPC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1380-14) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Thursday, 04-03-14.

Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with Representative(s) Aquino, Awana, Cullen, Har, Tokioka, Ward, Yamane voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Fale, McDermott voting no (2) and Representative(s) Cachola, Carroll, Oshiro, Say excused (4). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 430).
Deferred until 04-08-14.
Deferred until 04-10-14.
